name: groupdocs/groupdocs-viewer
description: The GroupDocs.Viewer for Cloud plugin for SilverStripe helps you embed documents, complete with GroupDocâ€™s high-fidelity, online document viewer, into webpages to view documents of many different file formats. GroupDocs.Viewer is an online application that allows you to share, view, and read documents online using a browser. No new software installations are needed. View the most common file-formats (DOCX, PDF, PPYX, XLS) and share files easily with your colleagues from your desk!
